reviewtext: If you follow the instructions (that is why they are there) this lock will work just fine, I have never had it "mysteriously" change combination on me.  There are only two problems with this little lock, the first is, it tends to seize up on occasion, but it comes out after a few seconds (not 5 minutes as mentioned by another reviewer).  Also, this lock is fairly easy to change the combo, so if you have a roommate that hates you, or criminals that carry around screwdrivers, you may be in a bit of trouble.This is a MECHANICAL lock, it does not have a "mind o it's own."
